DataListSpec.Name: Child Extension Table List
DataListSpec.Description: Returns all Child Extension Table records.
DataListSpec.Author: memphis-PC\Administrator

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_CHILD_EXTENSION_TABLE as set nocount on;
select USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ID], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SIBLINGSID], USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[PROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE], USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDAGE], USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASOTHER], USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASOTHER], USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER], USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER], USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFSISTERS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFBROTHERS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLWOOD], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLMUD], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBAMBOO], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBLOCK], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTIN], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGGRASSLEAVES], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGWOOD], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTILE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEINDOOR], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCECOMMUNITYTAP], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEBOREHOLEWELL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCERIVER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEWOODFIRE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEELECTRICSTOVE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEGASSTOVE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEELECTRICITY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOILLAMP], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEGENERATOR], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCENONE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[AREADESCRIPTION], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[MYFAVORITETHINGTODO], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIPLAYWITHFRIENDSWE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENATHOMEIHELPOUTBY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENITALKTOGODIASKHIM], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIAMATSCHOOLILIKELEARNING], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SOMEDAYI], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[TWOMOSTFAVORITETHINGS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[OTHERTHINGSTHECHILDENJOYS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPERSONALITY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDHEALTH], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SPIRITUALDEVELOPMENT], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[REASONNOTATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CLASSLEVEL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[FAVORITESUBJECT], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[VOCATIONALSKILLS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CCHENTEREDBY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CCHTEMPID], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CURRENTPHOTODATE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[PHOTOSTORED], USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION] from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION left outer join dbo.USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID] = USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID] = USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID] = USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.ID inner join dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASCODEID] = USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.ID inner join dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASCODEID] = USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID] = USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID] = USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERREASONCODEID] = USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.ID inner join dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID] = USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE on USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID] = USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.ID
